title: Leveraging Shopify First-Party Data for Smarter Ad Targeting
excerpt: As third-party cookies disappear, Shopify merchants sitting on first-party data have a massive advantage. Here's how to turn your customer data into a targeting goldmine.
author: emma-rodriguez

content.text: In a world where third-party cookies are dead and privacy regulations are tightening, first-party data is your most valuable marketing asset. As a Shopify merchant, you're sitting on a goldmine of customer purchase data, behavior signals, and preference indicators.
What First-Party Data You Already Have

Your Shopify store collects purchase history, browsing behavior, email engagement, cart abandonment patterns, product preferences, and geographic data. This information is more accurate and valuable than any third-party data source.
Building Lookalike Audiences That Actually Work

Upload your top 20% of customers by lifetime value as a seed audience for lookalike targeting. These high-value customers create the best-performing lookalike audiences because they represent your ideal customer profile.

Use Conversions API to send server-side events back to Meta and Google. This improves campaign optimization significantly. metricx automates this process, ensuring your ad platforms receive the highest quality purchase data for better targeting.
